newsitem.title: INDIA: India Congress's J.B. Patnaik sees president.
newsitem.headline: India Congress's J.B. Patnaik sees president.

text.p: J.B. Patnaik, a Congress party leader and Orissa state chief minister, met Indian President Shankar Dayal Sharma on Friday, an official at the presidential palace said.

Patnaik, who was a member of Congress's five-person negotiating team that held talks with Prime Minister H.D. Deve Gowda's ruling coalition this week, met Sharma ahead of United Front alliance leader Chandrababu Naidu.
Patnaik and Naidu met the president while the lower house of parliament debated a motion of confidence in Deve Gowda.
